x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pwsgrp.y | |- Y = ( R ^s I ) |

| 4 |  | pwsinvg.n | |- N = ( invg ` Y ) |

| 20 | 14, 19 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ( R e. Grp /\ I e. V /\ X e. B ) -> X e. ( Base ` ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) ) ) |
| 21 | 5, 6, 8, 11, 12, 13, 20 | #P_prdsinvgd | |- ( ( R e. Grp /\ I e. V /\ X e. B ) -> ( ( invg ` ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) ) ` X ) = ( x e. I |-> ( ( invg ` ( ( I X. { R } ) ` x ) ) ` ( X ` x ) ) ) ) |

| 28 | 21, 27 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( R e. Grp /\ I e. V /\ X e. B ) -> ( ( invg ` ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) ) ` X ) = ( x e. I |-> ( M ` ( X ` x ) ) ) ) |

| 38 | 37 | #P_feqmptd | |- ( ( R e. Grp /\ I e. V /\ X e. B ) -> M = ( y e. ( Base ` R ) |-> ( M ` y ) ) ) |

| 40 | 34, 35, 38, 39 | #P_fmptco | |- ( ( R e. Grp /\ I e. V /\ X e. B ) -> ( M o. X ) = ( x e. I |-> ( M ` ( X ` x ) ) ) ) |
